ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (ISPICKVAL(Conflicts_2a_Not_Listed__c,'Yes') && ISBLANK(Conflicts_2b_Not_Listed_TXT__c)) || (ISPICKVAL( Conflicts_3a_Related_to_Transaction__c,'Yes') && ISBLANK( Conflicts_3b_Related_to_Transaction_TXT__c)) || (ISPICKVAL( Conflicts_4a_Conflict_of_Interest__c, 'Yes') && ISBLANK( Conflicts_4b_Conflict_of_Interest_TXT__c )) || (ISPICKVAL( Conflicts_5a_Other_Conflicts__c ,'Yes') && ISBLANK( Conflicts_5b_Other_Conflicts_TXT__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If any of Conflict Check questions under Conflicts Check Information are 'Yes,' please details in relevant text areas.
